R

register(int, UserRegisterDTO) - Method in class com.what2see.controller.user.UserController
Attempts to register a new user with the specified credentials.
It is intended to only be used for tourists or guides, since administrators are not supposed to be registered from outside the database.
Note that the UserRegisterDTO.username field is trimmed and case-insensitive while UserRegisterDTO.firstName and UserRegisterDTO.lastName fields are trimmed only.
register(T) - Method in class com.what2see.service.user.UserService
Registers a new User entity of type UserService.
The username is normalized to lowercase and trimmed.
The first and last name are trimmed.
The password is hashed.
Report - Class in com.what2see.model.tour
Entity that represents a report in the database.

ReportCreateDTO - Class in com.what2see.dto.tour
Implementation of DTO pattern for creating reports in the incoming body.
Information about the author is implicitly obtained from other request parameters

ReviewCreateDTO - Class in com.what2see.dto.tour
Implementation of DTO pattern for creating reviews in the incoming body.
Information about the author is implicitly obtained from other request parameters and creationDate is set to the current timestamp
